definition: World Honored One/Revered One of the World (Buddha)
surname Shi
life/age/generation/era/world/lifetime/epoch/descendant/noble
senior/of a senior generation/to honor/to respect/honorific/classifier for cannons and statues/ancient wine vessel

sentences.english: He said"our mind should dwell nowhere".
sentences.chinese: 世尊回答说“应无所住而生其心”。

sentences.english: The Sangha of the Blessed One's disciples has practiced well.
sentences.chinese: 世尊的声闻僧伽弟子行道正善。

sentences.english: The Buddha, in order to tame certain beings, was once reincarnated as a brothel visitor.
sentences.chinese: 世尊在因地时，为度化众生而化现为一嫖客。

sentences.english: Sutra of Buddha notes Buddha being a sage who possess of ten powers and four forms of fearlessness .
sentences.chinese: 佛经中的记载，世尊是十力具足，四无所畏的圣者。

sentences.english: Udaya filled the Blessed One's bowl with rice.
sentences.chinese: 三时，优陀耶婆罗门，以白饭盛满世尊之钵。

sentences.english: The Lord has surely abandoned suffering as this Dhamma has been realized by him.
sentences.chinese: 世尊确实摆脱了痛苦，因为你知道这个法门。

sentences.english: On approaching, having bowed down to the Blessed One, she stood to one side.
sentences.chinese: 走近跟前，向世尊顶礼后，她立于一旁。

sentences.english: I have heard that on one occasion the Blessed One was staying near Rajagaha at the Maddakucchi Deer Reserve.
sentences.chinese: 有一次，世尊住在王舍城附近的鹿野苑。

sentences.english: The Sangha of the Blessed One has entered on the good path;
sentences.chinese: 僧伽是世尊的追随者，良好地修行佛法。
除了伟大的世尊他自己。

sentences.english: He offered The Buddha with many flowers and incense.
The Brahmin Udaya filled the Blessed One's bowl with rice.
sentences.chinese: 三时，优陀耶婆罗门，以白饭盛满世尊之钵。

sentences.english: What Buddha's disciple said is as same as what Chuang Tzu said.
sentences.chinese: 庄子与世尊的弟子们所要表达的，其实是同样的东西。

sentences.english: I don't remember Buddha has ever asked people to abandon study in sutra.
sentences.chinese: 我实在不记得，在佛经里是否有世尊叫人绝学这回事。

sentences.english: The Sangha of the Blessed One's disciples who have practiced well.
sentences.chinese: 世尊的声闻僧伽弟子行道正善。

sentences.english: The Buddha stood in Paradise at the edge of the lotus pond, silently watching these events.
sentences.chinese: 佛世尊伫立在宝莲池畔，始终凝视着事情的经过。

definition: another name for Sakyamuni 釋迦牟尼佛|释迦牟尼佛, the historical Buddha
to extinguish worries and the sea of grief/nirvana (Buddhism)
Prince Ananda, cousin of the Buddha and his closest disciple
Buddha (a person who has attained Buddhahood, or specifically Siddhartha Gautama)
Manjushri, the Bodhisattva of keen awareness
pinyin: Wen2 shu1 shi1 li4 Pu2 sa4

definition: arhat (Sanskrit)/a holy man who has left behind all earthly desires and concerns and attained nirvana (Buddhism)
Sakyamuni Buddha (Sanskrit: sage of the Sakya)/Siddhartha Gautama (563-485 BC), the historical Buddha and founder of Buddhism
Buddhist monk (loanword from Sanskrit "bhiksu")
Nagarjuna (Nagarjuna Bodhisattva)
Sakyamuni Buddha (Sanskrit: sage of the Sakya)/Siddhartha Gautama (563-485 BC), the historical Buddha and founder of Buddhism
(of a deity) to take a material shape/to appear
Buddha Kassapa (Pāli) or Kāśyapa (Skt) (one of the Buddhas of the past)
to transmit Buddhist teaching/chakram or chakka (throwing disk)
Chakravarti raja (Sanskrit: King of Kings)/emperor in Hindu mythology
Prince Ananda, cousin of the Buddha and his closest disciple
the thirty-two physical characteristics of Buddha
